meanings.definition: Set free from bondage or restraint.
meanings.sent1: The hero disenthralled the princess from the evil wizard's spell.
meanings.sent2: After years of captivity, the prisoner was finally disenthralled and set free.
meanings.sent3: The magician disenthralled the audience with his amazing tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her determination disenthralled her from the chains of self-doubt.
meanings.sent5: The key to success is to disenthralled oneself from fear and embrace new challenges.

meanings.definition: Freed from mental or emotional control.
meanings.sent1: She felt disenthralled after letting go of past regrets.
meanings.sent2: The disenthralled artist expressed raw emotions in his paintings.
meanings.sent3: The disenthralled puppy wagged its tail happily, finally free from fear.
meanings.sent4: His disenthralled mind was now open to new possibilities and creativity.
meanings.sent5: The disenthralled child laughed freely, unburdened by worries.

meanings.sent1: The disenthralled bird soared high in the sky after being set free.
meanings.sent2: The disenthralled prisoners rejoiced as they stepped out into the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The disenthralled cat purred contentedly in its newfound freedom.
meanings.sent4: The disenthralled explorer breathed in the fresh air of the open wilderness.
meanings.sent5: The disenthralled spirit of the rescued hiker felt alive and grateful for freedom.
